messages.subject: Re: too many cartoons
messages.msgSnippet: I remember those days!  That was before homeschool. But the cartoon watching was ONE of the many reasons we took him out of public schools.He was(REALY)
messages.messageBody:
I remember those days! That was before homeschool. But the cartoon
watching was ONE of the many reasons we took him out of public
schools.He was(REALY) learning more from cartoons than school.
Atleast he was REMEMBERING more info. Soooo I started paying
attention to cartoons and watching them. There are even web sites you
can go on for cartoons that you can all learn from. That might spark
her interest in research. He (our son)just turned 13 and we've gone
from cartoons to monster creepy movies, to history and war movies.
Yeah, don't get all wiggy about cartoons. That'll pass. But DO watch
some with her and try not to compare her w/ brother. They all need to
be listened too. Well, that's my two bits worth! Jody
